comments.author: Husires
comments.body: With the modest design, I do not expect that the company will have enough liquidity to continue supporting these cards, and therefore, if it works, it will stop at some point during the coming weeks.Do you require identity verification? If this is the case, then you must develop the protection team to ensure customer data, and there are more reliable services that have been operating for a while, so I advise individuals to use them.Either if you do not request identity verification, then any notification to Visa or Master Card will cause these cards to be canceled and all their transactions reversed.
